TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Buklavu, title = Buklavu, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Buklavu} }

S.FORM: alang Buklavu ga niya mki sku Tayto Keng atu Genhe'I go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 225 buwan, 716 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 96% kyan ku 689 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 4% kyan ku 27 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Bunun 89%, Paywan 3%, Amis 1%, binah lihuyan s'uli 2%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkyahu' na Buklavu hya' ga Su nun sung. tay 'llaw na Buklavu hya' ga Kaminu. rekisi kayal kyokay qalang Buklavu ga ungat kyokay. hasisyo maki 1 hasisyo ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan khu skwan biru maki 1 khu skwan biru. tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Boklavo ga niya mki sko Tayto Keng ato Genhe'I go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 225 bowan, 716 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 96% kyan ko 689 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 4% kyan ko 27 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Bonon 89%, Paywan 3%, Amis 1%, binah lihoyan s'oli 2%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkyaho' na Boklavo hya' ga So non song. tay 'llaw na Boklavo hya' ga Kamino. rekisi kayal kyokay qalang Boklavo ga ongat kyokay. hasisyo maki 1 hasisyo ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan kho skwan biro maki 1 kho skwan biro. toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
